data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module provide a compatibility layer for Encode.pm users on
    perl versions earlier than v5.7.1, in the hope to increase
    backward-compatibility of the now-standard Encode module's API. It
    currently supports Perl 5.6.1, but Perl 5.6.0 is being planned.

    This module is currently supported by the perl-unicode list.
